MYSTERIOUS-X_SESSION.description: Type here yours MYSTERIOUS-X Session (after get scanning QR)

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode

LANGUAGE.description: Bot language. English => en, සිංහල => SI

AUTO_BİO.description: Set true for auto date, time in biography.

NO_LOG.description: Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. (SL=94) (US=1)Ex: 9471xxxx && 9471xxxx-1xxx or 9471xxxx,9471xxx... /

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: Xtroid bot Working Type. If you use “public”, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use “private”, only you can use your bot.

GIF_WEL.description: set custom welcom gif past direct lnk of mp4 or gif ⚠️must not bigger than 2MB ( can cange after )

GIF_BYE.description: set custom good bye gif past direct lnk of mp4 or gif ⚠️must not bigger than 2MB ( can cange after )

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! Use => default, to change back./ALIVE

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Kickme Message! Use => default, to change back.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => default, to change back.

GAN_IMAGE.description: Type image link for Gan Style plugin.

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.
